header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced Backend Engineer with 6+ years developing scalable, cloud-native applications using TypeScript, Java, Scala, and C#. Proven expertise in AWS services, microservices architecture, and continuous delivery pipelines. Strong background in building robust data platforms, event-driven systems, and RESTful APIs for high-traffic applications.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Built and maintained a platform providing schema registry and streaming libraries for event-driven microservices, processing millions of events daily through AWS Kinesis streams with DynamoDB state management

Developed an event data payload schema registry using AWS Smithy with GitHub Actions and Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, enabling teams to safely evolve data contracts with automated compatibility validation
Created a stream snapshot system allowing teams to maintain real-time state from Kinesis events, supporting unified content metadata catalogs across streaming video platforms
Built libraries for JSON/Protobuf serialization in Scala, Java, and Python with comprehensive unit testing using ScalaCheck
Collaborated on Delta Lake data pipelines using Parquet encoding and S3 storage, generating Spark jobs in Databricks for executive analytics dashboards and performance monitoring
Migrated teams from OpenAPI to AWS Smithy schemas, improving type safety and code generation across multiple programming languages

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core blockchain infrastructure using Scala and Akka actors for a proof-of-stake consensus algorithm serving supply chain verification clients
Built a RESTful HTTP API for node management including transaction signing, key rotation, and staking operations
Created a transaction streaming service using http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with Protobuf API for real-time blockchain data access
Developed a React proof-of-concept UI demonstrating integration capabilities for external applications

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Built full-stack features for a construction project management web application using C# microservices, .NET ecosystem, and Azure cloud deployment
Architected a cutting-edge change management system using Event Sourcing pattern with Event Store, enabling audit trails and state reconstruction
Developed complex business logic for construction project tracking including submittals, RFIs, issues, and change orders with ERP system integration
Worked extensively with MS SQL databases, implementing data models and optimizing query performance

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Built a comprehensive test automation framework in C# enabling non-technical team members to write and execute test cases
Developed an API testing suite for microservices and a Selenium-based UI testing framework using XPath selectors
Executed performance testing and load testing to ensure application responsiveness under high traffic conditions
